roleset.name: stomach ache
roleset.note: NAUSEATE-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from nauseate.01-v)
NAUSEATED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from nauseated.01-j)

example.name: with cause
example.text: Whatever we felt [*T*-2] about the redcoats , we respected them in terms of their trade , which [*T*-1]was killing ; ; and I know that [I , myself ,]-1 was nauseated *trace*-1 with apprehension and fear and that my hands were soaking wet where they held my gun [*T*-3] .
